question: days of our lives cast doug and julie
vanilla_rag_result: Doug and Julie are iconic characters from the soap opera "Days of Our Lives." They have been part of the show for many years and are known for their enduring love story, which has captivated audiences. Doug Williams, portrayed by Bill Hayes, and Julie Olson, played by Susan Seaforth Hayes, have experienced numerous ups and downs throughout their time on the show, including romantic entanglements, family drama, and personal challenges. Their relationship is a central theme in many storylines, showcasing themes of love, loyalty, and resilience.
